item.title: Launching A Web Browser From Ubuntu Shell
item.description:
Ubuntu allows aliasing commands to run a shell function. Below, I used xdg-open to open my Cloudflare Pages dashboard with an alias.

Add Ubuntu Function to .bashrc

I used VS Code to add this to my .bashrc file.pelican code-block Now, when I type cloudflare into my shell it launches â€¦
